info.title: Nepal Loadshedding Schedule
info.description: The core API which powers the Loadshedding Schedule service provided by Sparrow SMS for getting the weekly powercut schedule for any group in Nepal. Sparrow SMS has been providing this service via SMS and Web. And its now public for developers too :D

get.description: Returns whole week schedule for a particular group specified

parameters.name: ampm
parameters.description: If AM/PM Format is required, ampm=true should be supplied

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: format=json for JSON output, else its optional

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Group number to fetch the schedule for
